recommendation_description: Using a subject line or content that inspires feelings of fear or duty/obilgation to respond to motivate a response. A cybercriminal may use a range of emotions to help persuade a user to click a link or open an attachment without examining it first.
title: Emotional triggers (FEAR/DUTY)

title: Emotional triggers (CURIOSITY-QUESTIONS)

recommendation_description: Offering opportunities for low effort financial gain that may trigger feelings of greed to motivate a response. A cybercriminal may use a range of emotions to help persuade a user to click a link or open an attachment without examining it first.

recommendation_description: Attempting to appear organizationally relevant by speaking as a peer and work-related resources. title: Context alignment

title: Spoofed hyperlinks and websites
